translation.title: Desire, Etc. for the Not-Self Interior

next.name: Desire, Etc. for the Impermanent Exterior

previous.name: Desire, Etc. for the Suffering Interior

segments.en: 174–176. Desire, Etc. for the Not-Self Interior

segments.pli: “Yo, bhikkhave, anattā, tatra vo chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, you should give up desire … greed … desire and greed for what is not-self.

segments.pli: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, anattā; tatra vo chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo … pe …
segments.en: The eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are not-self …”

segments.pli: jivhā anattā; tatra vo chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo … pe …
mano anattā; tatra vo chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
Yo, bhikkhave, anattā tatra vo chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.

sections.title: “Mendicants, you should give up desire … greed ……
